Radical Research LLC is Mike McCarthy's new business venture.  I am looking to 
make a significant difference! 

I provide high quality science-based solutions to air quality challenges. Services 
include study design, quality assurance, risk assessment, environmental justice, 
data automation, and visualization.  I have experience with study and analysis 
design on local-to-national spatial scales and diurnal-to-decadal temporal scales. 

I hope to work with you in the future.
